title: Research and Markets: Global Residential Gateway Market 2015-2019 with Cisco Systems, Comtrend, Huawei Technologies, Pace & ZTE
text:
Research and Markets: Global Residential Gateway Market 2015-2019 with Cisco Systems, Comtrend, Huawei Technologies, Pace & ZTE October 14, 2015 02:10 PM   
DUBLIN-  Research and Markets ( http://www.researchandmarkets.com/research/w7glhv/global ) has announced the addition of the "Global Residential Gateway Market 2015-2019" report to their offering. 
The global residential gateway market to grow at a CAGR of 7.82% over the period 2014-2019. 
This report covers the present scenario and growth prospects of the global residential gateway market for the period 2015-2019. To calculate the market size, the report considers the unit shipment of residential gateways to Western Europe, North America, APAC, and ROW. In addition, the report discusses the major drivers influencing the growth of the global residential gateway market, outlines the challenges faced by vendors and the market at large, and the key trends emerging in the market. The report also includes a discussion on the key vendors operating in this market. 
The proliferation of smart devices in households has made the need for connectivity between said devices imperative, and this is a significant trend that is expected to bring about market growth during the forecast period. 
According to the report, the rise in demand for Internet protocol television (IPTV) will drive the market in the forecast period. IPTV delivers TV services to end-users via the Internet. IPTV service offers various additional features such as multi-screen viewing and bringing features of VoD to TV, which allows a customer to browse through an online program or film catalog, among other things. 
Further, the report states that lack of broadband infrastructure results in low customer satisfaction and reduced revenue for vendors. Therefore, lack of broadband infrastructure in certain regions is hindering the growth of the market.
